documents.document: Jerry: The best revenge is living well. George: There's no chance of that.
"I'm much more comfortable criticizing people behind their backs" -George
RT @CostanzaQs: http://t.co/jJDyLxnZUW
"Every woman on the face of the Earth has complete control of my life and yet, I want them all. Is that irony?" -George
http://t.co/J9qkN6dsLb
Just when I think you're the shallowest man I've ever met, you somehow manage to drain a little more out of the pool -Seinfeld
RT @Kramer_Quote: "The two of you need to work on trust… and then and only then will there be a free exchange of sex and discounts"
"I'll tell you what I like about Chinese people... they're stickin' with the chopsticks" -Jerry Seinfeld
"I relate to George through you. We're more like friends-in-law." - Elaine
"I don't think I'm special. My mother always said I'm not special" -George
"Why is bra singular and panties plural?" -Jerry Seinfeld
George: "She's got a little Marissa Tomei thing goin' on." Jerry: "Ah, too bad you've got a little George Costanza thing goin' on"
"Movie theater hot dogs, I'd rather lick the food off the floor" -Elaine
"I am special, my mother was right" -Jerry
Jerry: He's a doctor. You gotta pay what he says. George: Oh, no, no, no. I pay what I say.
Jerry: "Looking at cleavage is like looking at the sun. You don't stare at it. You get a sense of it and you look away."
Jerry: How are we going to get out of it? George: We'll say we're frightened and we have to go home.
"You want a Christmas card? You want a Christmas card? Here's your Christmas card!!!"
"The reason most people play golf is to wear clothes they would not be caught dead in otherwise" -Jerry Seinfeld
"Nobody takes better care of their hair than me. You can serve dinner on my head" - Elaine
"Why do they call it a "building"? It looks like they're finished. Why isn't it a "built?" -Jerry Seinfeld
"You can stuff your sorries in a sack, mister!" -George
Newman: "I mean parcels are rarely damaged during shipping." Jerry: "Define rarely." Newman: "Frequently."
"Well, I am just a T-bone kinda guy. Love that T-bone" -George
I'm not happy, I'm not lucky, and I don't go. If anything, I'm sad-stop-unlucky -Seinfeld
"If Relationship George walks through this door, he will kill Independent George. A George, divided against itself, cannot stand!"
"Dogs are the leaders of the planet. If you see two life forms, one of them�s making a poop, the other one�s carrying it for him, who would
"what's so great about a mom and pop store? let me tell ya something, if my mom and pop ran a store, i wouldnt shop there" -Jerry Seinfeld
Elaine, Newman is my sworn enemy, and he lives down the hall from my home. My home Elaine! Where I sleep, where I come to play with my toys.
"I feel like I've had two lives. My pre-mousse, and now I begin my post-mousse" -Kramer
"I don't return fruit. Fruit is a gamble. I know that going in" -Jerry
"I invented "it's not you, it's me." Nobody tells me it's them, not me" -George
"I'll tell ya, if I ever get out of here, I'm gonna change my life. I'm gonna do a whole Zen...thing" -George
Kramer: Tell me the truth: have you ever seen a better looking guy? Jerry: Looks are so subjective.
RT @CostanzaQs: http://t.co/elgWUCMclI

Kramer: "Tell me the truth: have you ever seen a better looking guy?" Jerry: "Looks are so subjective"
"I long for you" -George
"I'll tell you what the big advantage of homosexuality is. If you're going out with someone your size, you double your wardrobe" -Jerry
"When you look annoyed all the time, people think that you're busy" -George
"My parents didn't want to move to Florida, but they turned sixty, and that's the law" -Jerry Seinfeld
"I just can't be with someone who's life is in complete disarray" - Kramer
"I have never been anyone's type, but apparently, this Marisa Tomei loves funny, quirky, bald men" - George
http://t.co/HWnbFPVyZz
"Women go after doctors like men go after models, they want someone with knowledge of the body, we just want the body" -Seinfeld
"I've always been a stall man" -George
"Oh yeah, I usually sit around naked a couple hours a day. I cook naked, I clean naked, I drive naked, naked, naked, naked!" -Elaine
"I'm sorry, the card says "Moops"
RT @CostanzaQs: http://t.co/YCi4N1Ave6
"Pity is very underrated" -George
"People don't turn down money! It's what separates us from the animals" -Jerry Seinfeld
"If the cops arrest a mime, do they tell him he has the right to remain silent?" -Jerry Seinfeld
"If a book about failures doesn't sell, is it a success?" -Jerry Seinfeld
I hate rental cars. Nothing ever works: the window doesn't work, the radio doesn't work and it smells like a cheap hooker -Seinfeld
"The sea was angry that day, my friends. Like an old man trying to send back soup in a deli" -George
Jerry: "I don�t get you. Who goes on vacation without a job? What, do you need a break from getting up at 11:00?"
"Isn't it a bit unnerving that doctors call what they do "practice?" -Jerry Seinfeld
"Hawaii... The most sought-after postal route of them all. The air is so dewy-sweet you don't even have to lick the stamps." - Newman
"Hey, I've eaten frogs, so nobody's perfect" -George
"Man's Best Friend... Jerry, I want something like that on my tombstone" - Kramer
"I love a good nap. Sometimes it's the only thing getting me out of bed in the morning" -George
Elaine: My father thinks George is gay. Jerry: Because of all the singing? Elaine: No, he pretty much thinks everyone is gay.
"Well, it all sounds pretty glamorous, but it's business as usual at Kramerica"
Just when I think you're the shallowest man I've ever met, you somehow manage to drain a little more out of the pool -Seinfeld
"Vandelay Industries, Kel Varnsen speaking. May we help you?"
"Cheap fabric, and dim lighting. That�s how you move merchandise" -Morty Seinfeld
"Do the people that work in those little shops at the airport have any idea what the prices are, everywhere else in the world?" -Jerry
"I can't carry a pen, I'm afraid I'll puncture my scrotum" -George
"You got aloe? I love aloe" -George
Carol: Would you like to come upstairs for coffee?George: No, thanks, I can't drink coffee late at night. It keeps me up.
Well, sometimes we do actually have to get up early, but a man will always trade sleep for sex -Seinfeld
"I think I can sum up the show for you with one word.... nothing" -George
"Movie hot dogs? I'd rather lick the food off the floor" -Elaine
"I would drape myself in velvet if it were socially acceptable" -George
"I'm lactose intolerant. I have no tolerance for lactose and I won't stand for it!" -Seinfeld
"She had man-hands!"- Jerry
"Well, occasionally I like to help the humans" -Kramer
Jerry: It smells like a cheap hooker. Or is that you? Elaine: Give me ten bucks and find out.
"Can you be a closet claustrophobic?" -Jerry Seinfeld
"I don't trust men in capes" - George
Jerry: Elaine, have you ever gone out with a bald man? Elaine: No. Jerry: You know what that makes you, a baldist
"I'm like a phoenix, rising from Arizona!" -Frank Costanza
"I know less about women...than anyone in the world. But one thing I do know is they're not happy if you don't spend the night" -George
"Who buys an umbrella anyway? You can get them for free at the coffee shop in those metal cans" -George
Jerry: "Why do I always have the feeling everyone's doing something better than me on Saturday afternoon?"
Newman: "I mean parcels are rarely damaged during shipping." Jerry: "Define rarely." Newman: "Frequently."
George: "In high school it was always 'Bonjour, le George', 'How's it going le George?', 'Hey, let's stuff le George in le locker"
Jerry:, fire engines, ambulances all along the runway. And then, when we landed safely, they all seemed so...disappointed
"Look at it. I pulled it in perfectly equidistant from the car in front of me and the car behind me" -George
"I happen to dress based on mood" -George

George: "Why do they make the condom packets so hard to open?" Jerry: "Probably to give the woman a chance to change her mind."
"Is it possible to be totally partial?" -Jerry Seinfeld
"What's the deal with Aquaman? Could he go on land, or was he just restricted to water?" -George
"I want to be the one person who doesn't die with dignity. I live my whole life in shame. Why should I die with dignity?" -George
"Anytime four New Yorkers get into a cab together without arguing,a bank robbery has just taken place" -Jerry Seinfeld
Elaine: "Perhaps, there's more to Newman than meets the eye." Jerry: "No. there's less."
George: I know a guy who took a vacation on his change. Jerry: Yeah, Where'd he go, an arcade?
